reviewText:
Civil War western feat. Glenn Ford, Inger Stevens, George Hamilton, Harry Dean Stanton and for the first time: Harrison (J.) Ford!
Advertised as "remastered" image still looks soft but with good colors in original aspect ratio.
Disc contains two versions of this film:
1. French dub - 5 min cut
2. US version with FORCED French subs, 85' (-> 4% PAL speed up)

Film: 7/10
Picture quality: 7/10 as on 46" screen
Aspect ratio: 2.35:1 (orig.)
Run time PAL 50 Hz:
- orig. US version: 1:25'08"
- French dub version: 1:20'08"
Audio:
- French;
or
- Engl. + forced subs!
ST: F
RC: 2
Chapters: 12
Extras:Introduction by French film historian Patrick Brion, French/no ST, 6'
Studio: Sidonis
